Articles.Content:
The views are pretty because they are unreal.  

You are dreaming in a virtual reality, while others own the real hill.
In this universe, virtual reality is not possible. My ACTUAL HILL with pretty views
I hover my UFO above your hill, blotting out the sun. The pretty views are obscured and you die for....um....reasons. My hill.

Spoiler

you know by now, huh?/persistent.sfs

UFOs in fictional universe = 0

my hiiiiilllll

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-18T17:30:45Z" title="07/18/2018 05:30  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 18, 2018</time> by HansonKerman**
A nurse locks their room, so others can now get on the hill.
I cannot die ever. I take the hill with a big BDA equipped fighter. My hill.

I do not attempt to take over the hill, because I believe that [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) is a capable King of the Hill and I become a willing subject. However, after [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) becomes tyrannical and throws political dissidents into gulags, starting with someone who served the King a sandwich without any mustard, I start my own underground newspaper to spread the word that I'm starting a *new* hill, a *better* hill, where everybody has equal say and nobody is too powerful. However, my attempt at a revolution fails for three reasons:

1.) Nobody reads newspapers anymore.

2.) [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) finds out because I put an "@" next to "Minmus Derp," which sends a notification, and I get thrown into a gulag.

3. )This is just a silly Internet game, and my socialist schemes are needed in real life to push Texas into the Gulf of Mexico.

[@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) remains King of the Hill.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> I cannot die ever. I take the hill with a big BDA equipped fighter. My hill.
> 

I take over thy hill by nuclear bombs.

From an outdated nkd.
They found your irradiated body on the hill slope.

The Minmus Derp's BDA fighter gets krakened.

My hill.

> 
> 
> 8 hours ago, Confused Scientist said:
> 
> 
> I do not attempt to take over the hill, because I believe that [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) is a capable King of the Hill and I become a willing subject. However, after [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) becomes tyrannical and throws political dissidents into gulags, starting with someone who served the King a sandwich without any mustard, I start my own underground newspaper to spread the word that I'm starting a *new* hill, a *better* hill, where everybody has equal say and nobody is too powerful. However, my attempt at a revolution fails for three reasons:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 1.) Nobody reads newspapers anymore.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 2.) [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) finds out because I put an "@" next to "Minmus Derp," which sends a notification, and I get thrown into a gulag.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 3. )This is just a silly Internet game, and my socialist schemes are needed in real life to push Texas into the Gulf of Mexico.
> 

A: I do NOT DO THAT. I am a fair ruler. I'm thinking of changing it to democracy

B: What are gulags anyway? Ohhhh. I read about them in history.

C: I don't like mustard.

I make a new fighter. My hill. Oh and by the way, I cannot die.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-19T12:04:39Z" title="07/19/2018 12:04  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 19, 2018</time> by The Minmus Derp**
Yes, you cannot. You will be eternally floating through the space in your fighter when it's out of fuel.
My fighter has infinite fuel cheat enabled

Spoiler

You know what, I’m just gonna stop doing this/persistent.sfs

fighterNumber = 0

hillOwnership = HansonKerman

My hiiillll!

P.S. Y’all can become my subjects if you want. 

P.P.S. I like mustard.

P.P.P.S. I don’t like sandwiches.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-19T20:14:12Z" title="07/19/2018 08:14  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 19, 2018</time> by HansonKerman**

Spoiler

fighterNumber: 100000000

hillOwnership: the Minmus Derp 

subjectNumber: infinite

Moi Hill
N^j^et, moy hill!

Infinite is not a valid integer.

I buy the "Get Hill!" microtransaction.

My hill.
Not enough money. Account is locked. Transaction is rolled back.

persistent.sfs

hillCost = infinite

hoLamKermanWealth = infinite

log

{1. hoLamKerman : buy hill}

print("The hill was bought.")

print("My hill.")

hillOwnership: The Minmus Derp

fighterNumber!: 100000000000

my hill. Is that clear? My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-20T12:46:27Z" title="07/20/2018 12:46  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 20, 2018</time> by The Minmus Derp**

delete hill;  

hill = nullptr;
I make a pretty hill on a lake. My hill.

> 
> 
> 15 hours ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> Hide contents
> 
> 
> fighterNumber: 100000000
> 
> 
> 
> 
> hillOwnership: the Minmus Derp 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> subjectNumber: infinite
> 
> 
> 
> Moi Hill
> 

Two things. First, @the Minmus Derp is not a valid username. Second, moi is not a word. So, still my hill. You have your own hill. The users posting after this post will have to take one of our hills. Hows that sound?

Also,

Spoiler

hillOwnership = HansonKerman

fighterNumber = 0

userPokémon = Skarmory

Points to anyone who defeats me with a Fire- type and knows why.

Beep beep beep! My hill forevaaaaaah!

If it moves, shoot it. If it moves after that, shoot it again.

My hill.
